articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: European Court of Human Rights refuses to postpone the withdrawal of UK boy’s life support - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Archie Battersbee has been in a coma since he was found unconscious in April.
articles.content:
Updated 1 hour ago
A LAST-DITCH bid by the parents of a 12-year-old UK boy to postpone the withdrawal of his life support has been refused by the European Court of Human Rights.
